nodes.text: Coruscant Air Traffic Control, alternatively referred to as Galactic City Air Traffic Control or Coruscant Traffic Control, was the skylane traffic authority that maintained the skylanes on the planet Coruscant under the Galactic Republic, Galactic Empire, New Republic, and Galactic Federation of Free Alliances

Coruscant Air Traffic Control was charged with monitoring the skylane traffic in Galactic City on Coruscant. It maintained information on all speeders and their level of permissions on various skylane routes. It also retained hangar and maintenance information.
In 6 ABY, data on Coruscant maintained by Traffic Control was used by the New Republic when they captured Coruscant.
